summary: This is an FAA aircraft registration statement for Hyperion Air, LLC, certifying its eligibility to register aircraft as a U.S. citizen entity. It identifies Jeffrey E. Epstein as the sole member and Lawrence Visoski as the sole manager of the company.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.role: Sole Member of Hyperion Air, LLC
persons.context: Listed as the sole member and a U.S. citizen individual owner of Hyperion Air, LLC, which is registering an aircraft.

persons.name: Lawrence Visoski
persons.role: Sole Manager of Hyperion Air, LLC
persons.context: Identified as the sole manager of Hyperion Air, LLC and signed the registration statement as manager.

connections.description: Epstein is the sole member (owner) of Hyperion Air, LLC, and Visoski is the sole manager of the company.

events.title: Formation of Hyperion Air, LLC
events.description: Hyperion Air, LLC was lawfully organized in the United States Virgin Islands.

events.title: FAA Aircraft Registration Filing
events.description: Hyperion Air, LLC filed a statement with the FAA Aircraft Registry in Oklahoma City to register an aircraft.

locations: United States Virgin Islands (jurisdiction where Hyperion Air, LLC is organized)
Oklahoma City, Oklahoma (location of FAA Aircraft Registry filing)
keyFacts: Jeffrey E. Epstein was the sole member (owner) of Hyperion Air, LLC, a company formed to register aircraft.
Lawrence Visoski served as the sole manager of Hyperion Air, LLC and signed the FAA registration document.
The company was organized in the United States Virgin Islands with an effective date of October 1, 2012.
The document certifies that the LLC meets U.S. citizenship requirements for aircraft registration, with Epstein verified as a U.S. citizen.
The registration was filed with the FAA Aircraft Registry in Oklahoma City on August 13, 2013.
